passive.name: Spare No Effort
passive.description: Increases DMG dealt by the wearer by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>. The wearer also deals an extra <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of DMG to enemies whose current HP percentage is equal to or higher than the wearer's current HP percentage.
